response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This extraordinary item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, and I believe we can bridge the gap with a mutually beneficial arrangement. My offer to you is $950,000. I trust this proposal allows you to acquire the product without overextending your budget while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
